H0.text: Radio waves are the smallest region in the electromagnetic spectrum.

H1.text: Infrared light makes up the smallest region in the electromagnetic spectrum.

H2.text: Visible light makes up the smallest region in the electromagnetic spectrum.

H3.text: Gamma rays make up the smallest region in the electromagnetic spectrum.

A4.text: Gamma ray photons have the highest photon energy of any form of electromagnetic radiation.

A5.text: Gamma rays consist of the shortest wavelength electromagnetic waves, typically shorter than those of X-rays.
